thread.title: Ross McLeod - Aggravated Cutting
thread.title_full: Havealook reviewed by Ross McLeod - Aggravated Cutting

author: Ross McLeod - Aggravated Cutting
title: Ross McLeod - Aggravated Cutting
text:
This is my first web page ever and only had a small idea of how i wanted my web site to look but had no way of explaining it so i gave the Havealook team some web pages i liked the format and layout of, told them i wanted it to be clean, sharp and have a bit of a wow factor about it. It was hard for me at first to get my ideas across to them but with patience they coaxed me along and in the end i pretty much gave them free reign to see what they could come up with for me.
Well what they came back with blew my mind, i am so impressed with the final design and the help they gave me was sensational. They explained things over the phone whenever i had any issues and their tutorials are excellent in explaining how to go about adding and updating things as i got to learn my way around the website.
The initial cost while a little daunting at first, becomes less of an issue when you look at the final results. Im loving it and the ease in which i am able to manage it myself is fantastic. Well done Havealook..Aggravated Cutting
